event.name: AWS User Group Madurai
event.subtitle: Cloud Community Day
event.venue: PSNA College of Engineering and Technology
event.description: Join us for a day of learning, networking, and hands-on experiences with AWS technologies at PSNA College, Dindigul.

speakers.name: Priya Sharma
speakers.bio: Cloud architecture expert with 8+ years of experience in designing scalable solutions for enterprise clients across various industries.
sessions: Opening Keynote: The Future of Cloud Computing

speakers.name: Rajesh Kumar
speakers.bio: DevOps specialist focusing on CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure automation with extensive experience in AWS services.

speakers.name: Anitha Raman
speakers.bio: ML engineer specializing in AWS AI/ML services and data pipeline optimization with focus on real-world implementations.
sessions: AI/ML on AWS: From Concept to Production

speakers.name: Vikram Patel
speakers.bio: Security expert with deep knowledge of AWS security services and compliance frameworks for enterprise environments.

schedule.title: Opening Keynote: The Future of Cloud Computing
schedule.speaker: Priya Sharma
schedule.description: Exploring emerging trends and innovations in cloud technology, including serverless, edge computing, and AI integration

schedule.title: Building Scalable Serverless Applications
schedule.speaker: Rajesh Kumar
schedule.description: Deep dive into AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and serverless patterns with hands-on examples

schedule.title: AI/ML on AWS: From Concept to Production
schedule.speaker: Anitha Raman
schedule.description: Practical guide to implementing ML solutions using AWS services like SageMaker, Rekognition, and Comprehend

schedule.title: Lunch & Networking
schedule.description: Enjoy lunch while networking with fellow attendees and speakers

schedule.title: AWS Security Best Practices
schedule.speaker: Vikram Patel
schedule.description: Comprehensive security strategies for cloud environments including IAM, VPC, and compliance

schedule.title: Panel Discussion: Cloud Transformation Stories
schedule.speaker: All Speakers
schedule.description: Real-world experiences and lessons learned from cloud migrations and transformations

schedule.title: Closing Remarks & Prize Distribution
schedule.speaker: Organizing Team
schedule.description: Event wrap-up, prizes for quiz winners, and next steps for the community

highlights.title: Cloud Architecture
highlights.description: Learn modern cloud architecture patterns and best practices from AWS experts

highlights.title: Serverless Computing
highlights.description: Dive deep into AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and serverless application patterns

highlights.title: AI/ML Services
highlights.description: Explore AWS AI/ML services and real-world machine learning implementations

highlights.title: Security & Compliance
highlights.description: Master AWS security best practices and compliance frameworks

highlights.title: Data Analytics
highlights.description: Harness the power of AWS data analytics and visualization tools

highlights.title: Networking
highlights.description: Connect with cloud professionals and industry leaders in Tamil Nadu

faqs.question: What is the event format?
faqs.answer: This is a full-day in-person event featuring keynotes, technical sessions, panel discussions, and networking opportunities. All sessions will be conducted in English with interactive Q&A segments.

faqs.question: Is there a registration fee?
faqs.answer: No, this event is completely free for all attendees. However, registration is mandatory due to limited seating capacity of 200 attendees.

faqs.question: What should I bring?
faqs.answer: Bring your laptop, business cards, and enthusiasm to learn! We'll provide all materials, refreshments, lunch, and event swag. Don't forget to bring your QR code ticket for entry.

faqs.question: Will sessions be recorded?
faqs.answer: Yes, all technical sessions will be recorded and made available to registered attendees within 48 hours via email. The recordings will be accessible for 30 days.

faqs.question: Is there parking available?
faqs.answer: Yes, PSNA College provides complimentary parking for all attendees. Additional street parking is also available. The venue is wheelchair accessible.

faqs.question: Can I get certificates?
faqs.answer: Yes, all attendees will receive digital certificates of participation. These can be added to your LinkedIn profile and will be sent via email after the event.

faqs.question: What about food and refreshments?
faqs.answer: We provide welcome coffee, lunch, and evening snacks. Please mention any dietary restrictions during registration so we can accommodate your needs.

faqs.question: How do I network with other attendees?
faqs.answer: We have dedicated networking sessions during breaks and lunch. You'll also receive networking cards with QR codes to easily connect with other attendees on LinkedIn.

venue.name: PSNA College of Engineering and Technology
venue.directions: The college is located on the Dindigul-Trichy Highway, easily accessible by bus and car. Dindigul Railway Station is 15km away.
